Key Match Events: The Red Sox were dominated by Detroit Tigers ace Tarik Skubal in a 2-1 loss.
Post-Match Reflections: The Red Sox were no match for the Detroit Tigers ace, despite facing perhaps the best pitcher they'll see all season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tarik Skubal was widely considered a potential breakout candidate and a popular pick to win the American League Cy Young Award.
Others: Tarik Skubal reacted to striking out Red Sox rookie Ceddanne Rafaela in the eighth inning.
